SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.animatedblock

Interface IAnimationHook<T extends IAnimatedBlock>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of IAnimatedBlock used for the animation.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioAnimationHook
public interface IAnimationHook<T extends IAnimatedBlock>
Represents a hook into an IAnimation.

To hook into an animation, this hook needs to be registered with AnimationHookManager via the use of an IAnimationHookFactory.

Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns:
      The name of this hook. Used for logging purposes.

    • onPreAnimationStep

      default void onPreAnimationStep()
      Executed before a new animation step is applied.

      Note that this may never happen if the animation is skipped.

    • onPostAnimationStep

      default void onPostAnimationStep()
      Executed after a new animation step is applied.

      Note that this may never happen if the animation is skipped.

    • onPrepare

      default void onPrepare()
      Executed right before the animation starts.

      Note that this may never happen if the animation is skipped.

    • onAnimationEnding

      default void onAnimationEnding()
      Executed when the animation is in the finishing phase.

      Note that this may never happen if the animation is skipped.

    • onAnimationAborted

      default void onAnimationAborted()
      Executed when the animation has been aborted.

      This is not part of the normal animation pipeline. It may occur when the plugin stops, or when the chunks for the animation are being unloaded.

    • onAnimationCompleted

      default void onAnimationCompleted()
      Executed when the animation finishes.
